title: From or by Marcel Duchamp or Rrose Sélavy (The Box in a Valise) (de ou par Marcel Duchamp ou Rrose Sélavy (Boîte-en-valise)
medium: Leather valise containing 80 miniature replicas, color reproductions, and photographs of works by Duchamp
dimensions: composition and sheet (see individual components): dimensions vary; case (closed): 3 11/16 x 15 3/16 x 16 1/4" (9.4 x 38.5 x 41.2 cm); overall (opened): 15 3/4 x 15 3/16 x 36 1/8" (40 x 38.5 x 91.7 cm)
